channel.title: What language is best for games?
channel.description: I've done quite a bit of web design and JAVA game development. Something i have always wanted to learn is how to design games from making the sprites to setting actions to make them work correctly. I probably want to start with a 2d game or a basic 3d one. What language should i learn, whats best for programming games and why? thanks much!

item.title: What language is best for games?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

There is no ‘best’ language for general game development. I think that you should choose a language based on your ultimate goal, and your situation.

Read full topic
item.source: What language is best for games?

item.title: What language is best for games?
item.dc:creator: @teh_spede Teh Spede
item.source: What language is best for games?

item.title: What language is best for games?
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

I’d use C# with XNA or Unity, AS3 with Flash, Java with a library for Java games, C++/C for Unreal Engine games, HTML5 (Javascript) for HTML5 games,…

Depends on what platform you’re aiming for.

Read full topic
item.source: What language is best for games?
